title: Exploring Fundamental Chemistry Concepts: Understanding Elements, Compounds, and Mixtures

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary School-Level Basic Chemistry Terminology Understanding
context.additional_context: An intensive foundational chemistry concepts course for professionals needing improved scientific literacy and analytical skills

learning_goals: Learners can explain the definitions and differences between elements, compounds, and mixtures using scientific terminology.
Learners can systematically classify chemical substances by observing and investigating given samples.
Learners can synthesize information gathered through WebQuest activities to analyze real-world applications of chemical concepts.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
